column5: Nice photo Mike.   Link has been changed at source. See further down for the photo. http://www.muskiescanada.ca/members/files/pdf/Sep_Oct_2012_RJ_Web.pdf

The great photo of Mike and his son is no longer visible due to the fact that it graces the front cover of the current Muskies Canada Release Journal Which is only available to members.  Perhaps Mr. P will post it though...
